0.name: Alegrete Town
0.description: Take a rest, you are safe, if you can stand the heat. Maybe pay a visit to the shop.

1.name: Forest
1.description: A road goes through these woods. It looks like the perfect spot for an ambush.

2.name: Hunters Camp
2.description: This camp is abandoned, or maybe not. Be careful who you meet.

3.name: Cemitery
3.description: This is an old cemitery where ancient warriors who lost their lives in the past are buried. Beware of your enemies.

4.name: Arid fields
4.description: This is a big open field of dry plants e sun-baked rocks. It's just too hot here. Not as hot as Alegrete town though.

5.name: Elf Town
5.description: A beautiful building, with intricate details, made by beatiful elfs. This is a safe spot.

6.name: Green plains
6.description: This is a big open field. A lot of creatures make their nest in here.

8.name: Dark Forest
8.description: These woods is so dark that can hide basically any kind of creature.

9.name: The Upside Down
9.description: Everything is darker and full os gross roots. There's something lurking in the shadows...

10.name: Hell's cave
10.description: Everything is burning in this place. The peace is too far away.

11.name: Nightmare Ruins
11.description: A bunch of ruined building. Your nightmares are real here.

12.name: Temple of Death
12.description: This place looks more like a giant skull than a temple. Life is something strange.

13.name: Montain path
13.description: Around you there is only tall montains and the road is very winding. Careful not to be caught by surprise.

14.name: Grotesque Swamp
14.description: It's hard to walk around, everything is damp and moist. There's insects the size of you torso.

15.name: Dragon's lair
15.description: There's a lot of gold at the other side, but the something between you and the gold...

16.name: Dark Cathedral
16.description: Once this was a blessed place, now there is only chaos.

17.name: Dirty Road
17.description: A pretty common road, full of dust and dirty.

18.name: Dusk Woods
18.description: This dark gray looking forest is full of lurking shadows and weird sounds.

19.name: Dark Cave
19.description: This cave lack any sourse of light, careful where you step... or what.

20.name: Obsidian Tower
20.description: This is a completely smooth and black tower, in the middle of nowhere.

21.name: Blood Lake
21.description: This red lake got this name clearly because of it's water color. It's probably just a high iron concentration on the water.

22.name: Cristal Cave
22.description: The wall of this cave is covered with small semi-transparent stones.

23.name: Sword Graveyard
23.description: This open field is covered with probably more than a thousand swords stuck in it's ground.

24.name: Arid Mountain
24.description: This place lacks most kinds of flora. It's just small to colossal rocks.

25.name: Deacayed Castle
25.description: It used to be a beautiful castle, full of life. Now it's ruins and decay.

26.name: Soulflayer Canyon
26.description: This is a deep canyon where, even in the high sun, it's impossible to see it's bottom.

27.name: Witchwood
27.description: This is a mysterious forest covered in a thick fog. .

28.name: Abandoned Mine
28.description: There's not much more than a some damaged rails, old rail cars and a lot of dust here.

29.name: Catacombs
29.description: An ancient burial chamber of considerable size.
